sentence.text: Social revolutionaries have been keenly aware of the force of nationalism , as well as ideologically committed to national autonomy , even when it is not actually wanted , as among the Lusatian Slavs , whose language is slowly retreating , in spite of the previous admirable efforts of the German Democratic Republic to foster it .

Peter Wright has done an admirable job and not just in the set scrum .
What an admirable person she was !
Leapor 's willingness to make jokes at her own expense is one of the admirable qualities of her work .
His passion for work was insatiable , an admirable quality in a man .
